text: Commentary on Romans may refer to the following commentaries on Epistle to the Romans: *Commentary on Romans (Origen), by Origen *Commentary on Romans, by Ambrosiaster *Commentary on Romans (Pelagius), by Pelagius *Commentary on Romans (Luther), by Martin Luther *Commentary on Romans (Calvin), by John Calvin *Commentary on Romans (Barth), by Karl Barth Category:Epistle to the Romans
title: Commentary on Romans
